mapper.insert: insert into account (id, pw, name, gender, birth, email, phoneNum, notice, sms, permit) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{phoneNum}, 1, 1, 1)
mapper.update: update account set classNum = #{classNum}, num = #{num},notice = #{notice}, sms = #{sms} where id = #{id}
update account set schoolid = #{schoolId} where id = #{userId}
update account set permit = #{permit} where id = #{id}
update account set auth = #{key} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from account where email = #{email} and auth = #{key}
